objective: Create a baseline snapshot of current schema definitions in the repo. Descriptive only, no prescriptive changes. Output is immutable reference for later audits.

constraints.style: deterministic, terse, Markdown headings with bullets/tables
rules: Ground all findings in visible JSON schema files under defs/ and synesthetic_asset.json
List every field exactly as defined in current repo
No speculation about missing fields or future design
Always write the full evaluation report to meta/output/schema_eval_<DATE>.md
Always write the snapshot to meta/output/schema_eval_<DATE>.json
Also update meta/output/schema_eval_latest.md and meta/output/schema_eval_latest.json as aliases
DATE must be in YYYYMMDD format
Eval is incomplete unless all four files are created or overwritten with non-empty content

exit_criteria: All schemas listed with their fields exactly as defined
